title: AGW: still wrong
author: VD
content_html:
Never forget, science fetishists such as Richard Dawkins and PZ Myers have staked the credibility of science on anthropogenic global warmingclimate change:

ICE is expanding in much of Antarctica, contrary to the widespread public belief that global warming is melting the continental ice cap…. A paper to be published soon by the British Antarctic Survey in the journal Geophysical Research Letters is expected to confirm that over the past 30 years, the area of sea ice around the continent has expanded.

And, if we apply the atheist logic of Daniel Dennett here, we can only conclude: You cannot trust biologists. Because climatologists have amazingly inaccurate models.

Never forget, science fetishists such as Richard Dawkins and PZ Myers have staked the credibility of science on
anthropogenic
global warming
climate change
:
ICE is expanding in much of Antarctica, contrary to the widespread public belief that global warming is melting the continental ice cap….  A paper to be published soon by the British Antarctic Survey in the journal Geophysical Research Letters is expected to confirm that over the past 30 years, the area of sea ice around the continent has expanded.
And, if we apply the atheist logic of Daniel Dennett here, we can only conclude:
You cannot trust biologists.  Because climatologists have amazingly inaccurate models.
